name: dataset.txt
description: Usage of the TDC library for downloading and splitting datasets. Use this only when the raw dataset is missing.

name: preprocess_drug.txt
description: Utility functions for preprocessing drug SMILES data, including molecular fingerprinting(eg. morgan), molecule graph construction for GNNs, and other methods such as one-hot encoding for CNNs. Pretrained methods are NOT included.

name: preprocess_protein.txt
description: Utility functions for preprocessing amino acid sequence data, including fingerprinting and other methods such as one-hot encoding for CNNs. Pretrained methods are not included. Functions processing protein pdb structures are not included.

name: pretrain_drug.txt
description: Documentation covering utility functions for generating embeddings using pretrained models for drugs, along with guidance for fine-tuning a pretrained model.

name: pretrain_protein.txt
description: Documentation covering utility functions for generating embeddings using pretrained models for proteins.
